industry.description: The SASB Sustainable Industry Classification System (SICS) industry to which the company belongs, e.g., 'Media & Entertainment', 'Software & IT Services'.

metric_code.description: The SASB metric code, such as TC-SI-230a.1, if available in the company's official disclosures.

metric_name.description: The name or title of the SASB metric being reported, e.g., 'Data Privacy & Security', 'Energy Management'.

disclosure_summary.description: Short factual description summarizing what the company reports for this SASB metric.

metric_value.description: The reported numeric or qualitative value disclosed by the company for this metric (e.g., '45% reduction in emissions').

metric_unit.description: The unit or measurement type associated with the metric_value (e.g., 'percent', 'MWh', 'tCO₂e').

un_sdg.description: The UN Sustainable Development Goal linked to this SASB metric, e.g., 'SDG 13: Climate Action'.

commitment_level.description: Specifies how deeply the SASB-aligned activity is embedded in company operations: core_commitment, strategic_initiative, or occasional_activity.

evidence.description: Citation or concise factual statement supporting the SASB disclosure record.

source_1.description: Primary source URL for this record (e.g., company ESG or sustainability report).

source_2.description: Secondary source URL for this record, if available.

source_3.description: Tertiary source URL for this record, if available.

ai_confidence_level.description: Confidence level assigned by the Fact-Checking Agent.

verification_correction.description: Optional note added by Fact-Checking Agent explaining corrections or clarifications made to the record.

company_name.description: The registered name of the company, in case of international company refer to the parent or topmost company.

program.description: The name of the volunteering initiative, campaign, or program.

program_type.description: Categorization of the volunteer program type based on nature and structure of engagement.

description.description: Short factual summary of the volunteer program and its objectives.

impact_created.description: Quantitative value of total volunteering effort (e.g., '3,200').

community_beneficiary.description: The community or group benefiting from the volunteer program (e.g., 'local schools', 'elderly support groups').

un_sdg.description: The UN Sustainable Development Goal aligned with the volunteering activity (e.g., 'SDG 4: Quality Education').

commitment_level.description: Specifies how deeply the volunteering activity is embedded in the company's social value culture.

evidence.description: Short factual statement citing the source or evidence of the activity.
